title: About
seoDescription: Playard - Where You Find Sports Kakis | About us
content: Playard is simple. We want to make playing sports as easy as in the old days, when your parents simply grabbed a ball and started playing in their backyard. Playard connects you to people, sportswear, facilities, coaches and more. We are inspired to bring sports closer to each corner in the world, starting with Singapore.
subtitle: find out more about playard
